Der faule Taugenichts findet eines Tages seine Freundin Cody Weeson (Sarah Lind) bewusstlos in ihrer Wohnung vor, nachdem sie eine √úberdosis Heroin genommen hat. metadata.Plot: A young widow returns home for the first time in three years to help prepare her sister's wedding. She is forced to confront her past, including the man she never expected to fall for.
metadata.Writer: John Dion, Sean Fine, Velinda Godfrey
metadata.Actors: Courtney Ford, Ryan Caltagirone, David Stanbra
